itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway interview the real life Narcos Steve Murphy and Javier Peña about killing Pablo Escobar and what it was like at the scene of his death, the show ‘Narcos’, working undercover and the most messed up things they saw, Pablo Escobar’s orgies, and legalizing drugs.
